LanguageData.BAW_Saki.label: RABBIT-26 type Machine Gun
LanguageData.BAW_Saki.description: Regulation machine gun issued to Saki by the SRT Special Academy.\n\nRequires arduous maintenance due to its construction, this gun boasts significant firepower as long as it is maintained properly.
LanguageData.BAW_Saki.tools.0.label: stock
LanguageData.BAW_Saki.tools.1.label: barrel
LanguageData.Bullet_BA_Saki.label: Bullet for RABBIT-26 type Machine Gun
LanguageData.BAW_Miyako.label: RABBIT-31 type Submachine Gun
LanguageData.BAW_Miyako.description: Regulation submachine gun issued to Miyako by the SRT Special Academy.\n\nIt is a highly reliable gun and can effectively repel the enemy even under extreme circumstances.
LanguageData.BAW_Miyako.tools.0.label: stock
LanguageData.BAW_Miyako.tools.1.label: barrel
LanguageData.Bullet_BA_Miyako.label: Bullet of RABBIT-31 type submachine gun
LanguageData.BAW_Miyu.label: RABBIT-39 type Rifle
LanguageData.BAW_Miyu.description: Regulation sniper rifle issued to Miyu by the SRT Special Academy.\n\nFinely made and boasts an amazing accuracy.
LanguageData.BAW_Miyu.tools.0.label: stock
LanguageData.BAW_Miyu.tools.1.label: barrel
LanguageData.Bullet_BA_Miyu.label: Bullet of RABBIT-39 type Rifle
LanguageData.BAW_Moe.label: 萌绘的通讯装置与望远镜
LanguageData.BAW_Moe.description:
!该武器机制尚未完善！

萌绘的战斗鹰直升机正在外围待机。用望远镜指示器与通讯器来为萌绘提供攻击坐标，她会立刻发射大量的火箭弹把目标地点炸翻天！

这会需要很长的时间来引导射击，你需要清楚的视野、足够的时间且你不应该朝自己开火。
LanguageData.BAW_Moe.tools.0.label: stock
LanguageData.BAW_Moe.tools.1.label: barrel
LanguageData.Bombardment_beacon.label: Target Beacon
LanguageData.BAW_MoeHG.label: Rabbit-224 type pistol
LanguageData.BAW_MoeHG.description: A standard pistol that Moe received from SRT Special Academy.\n\nIn spite of being a pistol, it has a high rate of fire and can empty its magazine in a blink.
LanguageData.BAW_MoeHG.tools.0.label: stock
LanguageData.BAW_MoeHG.tools.1.label: barrel
LanguageData.Bullet_BA_Moe.label: Bullet of Rabbit-224 type pistol
